text: Pierre Alechinsky (born 19 October 1927) is a Belgian artist. He has lived and worked in France since 1951. His work is related to tachisme, abstract expressionism, and lyrical abstraction.moma.org ==References== ==Other websites== *Examples of Pierre Alechinsky Editions *Galerie Lelong, Paris * Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from Brussels
title: Pierre Alechinsky
